game.name: Red Passport: Ticket to Russia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 러시아를 가로지르는 흥미진진한 여행을 떠나세요! 아늑한 아파트에서 공항으로, 비행기로 새로운 도시로, 그리고 기차로 블라디보스토크까지. 탐험하고, 퍼즐을 풀고, 길 위의 비밀을 밝혀 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a thrilling journey across Russia! From a cozy apartment to the airport, fly to a new city, and ride a train to Vladivostok. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets along the way!
